updates.title: Software Engineer at Fair Square
updates.description: Build growth experiments, a custom CRM, Plaid for Medicare brokerages, call analysis platform, and AI voice bots.

updates.title: Joined Dime (YC S21) as first hire
updates.description: Full-stack engineer, helped build initial product.

updates.title: Started Ivy
updates.description: Founded a music sharing platform that grew to thousands of users.

intro.title: Yo
intro.description: My name is Sam Nordale, and this is my website.

intro.title: About
intro.description: I'm a full-stack software engineer based in Brooklyn, NY. I've worked on everything from consumer apps, to AI voice agents, to web automations, to machine learning.

sections.title: Background
sections.content: I grew up in Seattle and graduated from McGill in 2020. I did a few design internships and took a bunch of CS theory, which helped me realize I want to make things instead.

sections.title: Off the Court
sections.content: When I'm not coding, you can find me playing basketball, climbing, or reading. I also enjoy working on side projects.

projects.title: Fair Square
projects.description: Build growth experiments, a custom CRM, Plaid for Medicare brokerages, call analysis platform, and AI voice agents.

projects.title: Dime
projects.description: First hire after YC, worked closely with founder to build initial product.

projects.title: Ivy
projects.description: A music sharing platform that connects music enthusiasts, allowing them to discover and share their favorite tracks.

projects.title: CalvinB0t
projects.description: A Twitter bot that posts daily Calvin and Hobbes comics, bringing nostalgia and joy to followers.
